env.info: (hold 0) (plate 0) (at 0 1) (sort 1 couch) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (sort 2 chair) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (sort 3 closet) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (type 3 container) (closed 3) (sort 4 cupboard) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (type 4 container) (opened 4) (sort 5 microwave) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (type 5 container) (closed 5) (sort 6 book) (size 6 small) (color 6 red) (sort 7 book) (size 7 small) (color 7 blue) (sort 8 book) (size 8 small) (color 8 green) (sort 9 cup) (size 9 small) (color 9 red) (sort 10 bottle) (size 10 small) (color 10 red)

test.instr:
(:ins (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (sort Y closet))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X green) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X blue) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X red) (sort Y couch))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X red) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X red)))
)
test.nl: Take out the bottle from closet. Put the green book in microwave. Put the blue book in cupboard. Put the red book on couch. Go to the microwave. Take out the red cup from the microwave. Pick up the red bottle.
